name: Crime Brûlée
description:
You are a chef, trapped by mobsters, and are being forced to cook them desserts! You want to take out their boss, Don Rizzo. Study the behavior of the mobsters to learn about their likes and dislikes. Poison one of your desserts in the fifth course, and make sure it reaches Don Rizzo!

This game was created by Felix Fah and Abe Wits in 4 days. Music was created for this game by Jonas Trautmann. Font: https://github.com/fcambus/spleen(BSD-2).
